sentence: Great staff good value but we had some issues
The location was great staff were friendly and room was clean
From Palalie and his colleagues at the front desk to the cleanliness and modern style of the room this last minute choice will remain a permanent choice whenever I visit Waikiki in the future
I love the location and the staff is great
Staff are always friendly and helpful
The room was clean upon arrival and the employees were very friendly and helpful
Great location and great staff
Great Customer Service
Staff was wonderful room was great location worked very well for us stayed about 2 weeks with no issues Will be even better when lobby renovations done
Very clean hotel friendly staff and quiet
Complimentary beach towels and chairs just ask the front desk
I work at a 5 star luxury hotel so i m somewhat of a service snob and do nt give compliments freely unles they are deserving of it
There is no washing service at the hotel you would have to take all your washing to their sister hotel if you wanted to do any washing during your stay
Although there ’s no restaurant in the hotel unfortunately and I do n’t believe they do room service

photos look amazing but carpets are dirty ac does not work plumbing was broken some employees were sassy valet was so small we had to park somewhere else not so interactive people noisy part of waikiki elevator was broken towards end of stay
When I spoke to the woman at the front desk she said that we needed to get there early to get one of their limited spots but that there was parking available all around the hotel
there is no laundry room dry cleaning service only but you can walk to coin laundry shop I do laundry near OHANA waikiki east by Outiger
Mentioning it to Reception just resulted in shrugged shoulders and we will get a maintenance person to look at it
it is close to the places we like But the rooms are in bad shape the room services are bad also Front desk people are nice friendly
Given the price paid location service and length of stay it was acceptable
